特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be offered in face-to-face format.

第1回:
Introduction: Orders in East Asia

On-demand Implementation
第2回:
Pax Americana and the Cold War Order

On-demand Implementation

Reading: Yahuda, Chapter 2;
Miller and Wich: Chapters 2 & 7
第4回: Korea: From Colony to Divided Nation
第5回: Japan and the United States: From Enemies to Allies
第8回: The End of the Cold War and the United States in the Post-Cold War Era

Read: Yahuda, Chapter 3;
Miller and Wich, Chapter 11
第9回:
Read: Miller and Wich, Chapter 12;
Yahuda, Chapter 5
第10回: Japan’s Lost Decades and Attempts at Reassertion
第11回: Divided Korea: The Cold War’s Last Battlefront
第13回: Southeast Asia: Negotiating the new Cold War?
トピック.授業外学習2: As a general rule, students will be expected to spend one to two minutes of time outside class preparing for every minute of class time.
